name: productively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that produces or results in a large amount of something: Their working system is based on the belief that people work more productively in a team.
in a way that has good or useful results: Keeping children productively occupied during the summer holidays can be a challenge.
education , language
  specialized in a way that relates to the ability to produce language, rather than just understand it: He may be familiar with the word, although he has never used it productively. Related word
productive
More examplesFewer examplesIt is important to have a workplace environment where everyone can work productively.We need someone with the ability to use financial resources productively.Set aside enough time each day to write productively.Parents with grown-up children may be looking for new ways to be productively engaged.Young children use language productively from their very earliest utterances.
